topic.title: Forward reports
topic.p: To see %product% reports in the %product_cloud% UI, you need to upload them to %product_cloud%. To correctly upload and display a %product% report in the %product_cloud% UI, you need to make these steps:

list.li: Create a new project in the %product_cloud% UI
Run %product% with the project token supplied

topic.p: To create a new project, on the Projects page click the New project button in the upper-right corner.
After a new project was created, you can configure it.

list.li: Click the project menu button to rename or remove it from %product_cloud%.
Click the Generate token button to generate the project token. Copy and save this token for future use.

topic.note: After generation, the token is available for copying only before pushing the first report to %product_cloud%. The same rule applies to renaming and deletion of projects.
